title: Drawing, "Study for St. Paul the Hermit", 1800–20
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: The hermit is shown seated between rocks and beneath a tree.  He sleeps seated.  A loaf of bread lies before him and the raven approaches carrying something in his beak.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study for St. Paul the Hermit", 1800–20.
1800–20. Crayon, gouache. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2732.
